532 typedef struct RAIL_CsmaConfig {
536  uint8_t csmaMinBoExp;
540  uint8_t csmaMaxBoExp;
546  uint8_t csmaTries;
551  int8_t ccaThreshold;
559  uint16_t ccaBackoff;
563  uint16_t ccaDuration;
569  uint32_t csmaTimeout;
570 } RAIL_CsmaConfig_t;
571 
577 #define RAIL_CSMA_CONFIG_802_15_4_2003_2p4_GHz_OQPSK_CSMA { \
578  /* CSMA per 802.15.4-2003 on 2.4 GHz OSPSK, commonly used by ZigBee */ \
579  /* csmaMinBoExp */ 3, /* 2^3-1 for 0..7 backoffs on 1st try */ \
580  /* csmaMaxBoExp */ 5, /* 2^5-1 for 0..31 backoffs on 3rd+ tries */ \
581  /* csmaTries */ 5, /* 5 tries overall (4 re-tries) */ \
582  /* ccaThreshold */ -75, /* 10 dB above sensitivity */ \
583  /* ccaBackoff */ 320, /* 20 symbols at 16 us/symbol */ \
584  /* ccaDuration */ 128, /* 8 symbols at 16 us/symbol */ \
585  /* csmaTimeout */ 0, /* no timeout */ \
586 }
587 
595 #define RAIL_CSMA_CONFIG_SINGLE_CCA { \
596  /* Perform a single CCA after 'fixed' delay */ \
597  /* csmaMinBoExp */ 0, /* Used for fixed backoff */ \
598  /* csmaMaxBoExp */ 0, /* Used for fixed backoff */ \
599  /* csmaTries */ 1, /* Single try */ \
600  /* ccaThreshold */ -75, /* Override if not desired choice */ \
601  /* ccaBackoff */ 0, /* No backoff (override with fixed value) */ \
602  /* ccaDuration */ 128, /* Override if not desired length */ \
603  /* csmaTimeout */ 0, /* no timeout */ \
604 }
605 
613 typedef struct RAIL_LbtConfig {
617  uint8_t lbtMinBoRand;
621  uint8_t lbtMaxBoRand;
627  uint8_t lbtTries;
632  int8_t lbtThreshold;
640  uint16_t lbtBackoff;
644  uint16_t lbtDuration;
652  uint32_t lbtTimeout;
653 } RAIL_LbtConfig_t;
654 
662 #define RAIL_LBT_CONFIG_ETSI_EN_300_220_1_V2_4_1 { \
663  /* LBT per ETSI 300 220-1 V2.4.1 */ \
664  /* LBT time = random backoff of 0-5ms in 0.5ms increments plus 5ms fixed */ \
665  /* lbtMinBoRand */ 0, /* */ \
666  /* lbtMaxBoRand */ 10, /* */ \
667  /* lbtTries */ RAIL_MAX_LBT_TRIES, /* the maximum supported */ \
668  /* lbtThreshold */ -87, /* */ \
669  /* lbtBackoff */ 500, /* 0.5 ms */ \
670  /* lbtDuration */ 5000, /* 5 ms */ \
671  /* lbtTimeout */ 0, /* no timeout (recommend user override) */ \
672 }
